seo.title_override: Dallas Mattress Disposal Guide 2026: Easy & Legal
seo.meta_desc_override: Avoid $500-$2,000 fines with our 2026 Dallas mattress disposal guide. Learn about legal curbside pickup options and proper recycling rules in DFW.

hero_hook: Navigating Dallas mattress disposal can be tricky, risking hefty fines and environmental impact if not done right.
neighborhoods: Uptown, Lower Greenville, Bishop Arts District, Deep Ellum, Oak Lawn, Preston Hollow, Lake Highlands, Lakewood, Knox-Henderson, Medical District, Old East Dallas, South Dallas, Pleasant Grove, Northwood Hills, Highland Park

curbside_rules.size_limits: Residential customers receive monthly brush and bulky item curbside collection of up to 10 cubic yards. Click here to learn about a once annual 20 cubic yard exception.
curbside_rules.schedule_logic: Residential customers receive monthly brush and bulky item curbside collection. Residents should continue to follow their normal monthly brush and bulky schedule and leave set-out materials at the curb until they are collected.
